name: Roasted Broccoli
ingredients: Fresh broccoli, trimmed and cut into spears

instructions.en: Trim fresh broccoli and cut into spears
instructions.sk: Očistite čerstvú brokolicu a nakrájajte ju na ružičky
instructions.ja: 新鮮なブロッコリーを切り揃え、小房に切り分ける

instructions.en: Toss broccoli spears with oil, salt, and pepper to coat evenly
instructions.sk: Premiešajte ružičky brokolice s olejom, soľou a korením, aby sa rovnomerne obalili
instructions.ja: ブロッコリーの小房に油、塩、コショウを均一にまぶす

instructions.en: Arrange seasoned broccoli in a single layer on a roasting pan or baking sheet
instructions.sk: Rozložte ochutenú brokolicu v jednej vrstve na pekáč alebo plech na pečenie
instructions.ja: 味付けしたブロッコリーをローストパンまたはベーキングシートに一層に並べる

instructions.en: Bake at 375-400°F (190-200°C) for 20 minutes, until tender and browned
instructions.sk: Pečte pri teplote 190-200°C 20 minút, kým nebude mäkká a zhnednutá
instructions.ja: 375-400°F（190-200°C）のオーブンで20分間、柔らかくなり褐色になるまで焼く
